definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Someone held that Qian's deeds were flagrantly anti-party.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲，錢三強是更加露骨地反對黨的領導。
